channel.title: Random access to my computer from foreign countries?

item.title: Random access to my computer from foreign countries?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:282994”]Thats defiantly not normal, contact your ISP and report them.

I am afraid some newfag did tell a gayfag your IP.[/quote]
I tried; The last time atleast. They said They can’t do anything about it &
They said that I should report to www.fbi.gov; But I cba to report 1000 + IP’s with a 6 page report. >.>

item.title: Random access to my computer from foreign countries?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

I’ve got a problem;

Okay, I recently encountered a problem.
I just finished rebooting; And right after all my programs started, This happened:

I’ve went through count-less IP’s looking them up.
And They are all foregin countries.
Argentina, Mexico, Spain, Italy…
I haven’t took a picture but last time I rebooted I got well over a thousand Messages.
Do you think some newfag gave my IP to a bunch of foreign gayfags?
189.240.55.179 ^ = Mexico.
Anyway,
If anyone has an answer. Please; Post.

Thanks,
Lewk.

Read full topic
